alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 10:24AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Gilchrist, Bradford, Alachua, northwestern Putnam, southwestern Union, south central Columbia and Clay Counties through 1115 AM EST... At 1024 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Keystone Heights to Alachua to 6 miles south of High Springs to near Andrews. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Green Cove Springs, Starke, Trenton, Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Melrose, Worthington Spring, Middleburg and Alachua. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam
